author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: کتاب نزل بالحقّ لقوم یفقهون ویأمر النّاس بالعدل والتّقی ویمنعهم عن البغي والفحشآء لعلّ النّاس هم ینتبهو
translation: A Book sent down in truth unto men of insight! It biddeth the people to observe justice and to work righteousness, and forbiddeth them to follow their corrupt inclinations and carnal desires, if perchance the children of men might be roused from their slumber.
